ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, paraffinum liquidum (vaseline oikl), petrlatum (white vaseline), glycerin, ceresin, lanolin, cera alba (beeswax), lanolin alcohol, magnesium sulfate, parfum, cetearyl alcohol, cetearyl ethylheyxanoate, sorbitan sesquioleate, stearyl heptanoate, aluminum distearate, hydrogenated castor oil, isopropyl myristate, stearyl caprylate.

title: KREMA ZA NORMALNO DO MEŠANO KOŽO BIANCA, CERA DI CUPRA, 100ML
